name: Abortion
desc: Abortion refers to the voluntary termination of a pregnancy resulting in the death of the fetus or embryo. Abortions performed prior to the third trimester are legal in the United States
column4: although the issue has polarized mainstream political parties. Almost all state Democratic Party platforms support abortion while almost all state Republican Party platforms oppose it. (http://uspolitics.about.com/od/electionissues/i/abortion.htm)
